div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 351 Aidona, c. 18 km. SW of Kalambaka, Thessaly, 1955 Burial: c. 44 B.C. (Franke) Contents: 84+ AR Thessalian League: 4 double-vict. Roman Rep.: 4 den. (to T. Carisius) Disposition: Volos Franke, SM 1959, pp. 61-7, illus. Holly, RN 1966, pp. 8-10
